name: milder winters,
description:
The game is set in a future where temperatures are much cooler than they are now.
The plan is to use the winter to give players 'homes' to play in as they get older. As Nintendo Playroom states, Skipping the 'on day of Christmas', we want to give our players 'a chance to practice the basics of home building at the same time as they construct a home.' And who better to build around their player base than the Game of Thrones character, Jon Snow? The studio says a teaser trailer will be released 'at a later date' in the next couple of weeks, and the game launch will take place on 7th December.
